member.name: T:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode
member.summary: Specifies names of standard blend modes available in PDF.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.Normal
member.summary: Selects the source color, ignoring the backdrop.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.Multiply
member.summary: Multiplies the backdrop and source color values. The result color is always at least as dark as either of the two constituent colors. Multiplying any color with black produces black; multiplying with white leaves the original color unchanged. Painting successive overlapping objects with a color other than black or white produces progressively darker colors.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.Screen
member.summary: Multiplies the complements of the backdrop and source color values, then complements the result. The result color is always at least as light as either of the two constituent colors. Screening any color with white produces white; screening with black leaves the original color unchanged. The effect is similar to projecting multiple photographic slides simultaneously onto a single screen.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.Overlay
member.summary: Multiplies or screens the colors, depending on the backdrop color value. Source colors overlay the backdrop while preserving its highlights and shadows. The backdrop color is not replaced but is mixed with the source color to reflect the lightness or darkness of the backdrop.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.Darken
F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.Lighten
member.summary: Selects the lighter of the backdrop and source colors. The backdrop is replaced with the source where the source is lighter; otherwise, it is left unchanged.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.ColorDodge
member.summary: Brightens the backdrop color to reflect the source color. Painting with black produces no changes.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.ColorBurn
member.summary: Darkens the backdrop color to reflect the source color. Painting with white produces no change.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.HardLight
member.summary: Multiplies or screens the colors, depending on the source color value. The effect is similar to shining a harsh spotlight on the backdrop.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.SoftLight
member.summary: Darkens or lightens the colors, depending on the source color value. The effect is similar to shining a diffused spotlight on the backdrop.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.Difference
F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.Exclusion
member.summary: Produces an effect similar to that of the mode but lower in contrast. Painting with white inverts the backdrop color; painting with black produces no change.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.Hue
member.summary: Creates a color with the hue of the source color and the saturation and luminosity of the backdrop color.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.Saturation
member.summary: Creates a color with the saturation of the source color and the hue and luminosity of the backdrop color. Painting with this mode in an area of the backdrop that is a pure gray (no saturation) produces no change.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.Color
member.summary: Creates a color with the hue and saturation of the source color and the luminosity of the backdrop color. This preserves the gray levels of the backdrop and is useful for coloring monochrome images or tinting color images.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfBlendMode.Luminosity
member.summary: Creates a color with the luminosity of the source color and the hue and saturation of the backdrop color. This produces an inverse effect to that of the mode.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfButtonLayout.Overlay

member.name: M:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfDocument.CreateGoToPageAction(BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfPage,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates the new with specified properties and adds it to the collection of document actions.
member.param: The page of the document to be displayed as the result of the action.

The vertical coordinate of the page that should be positioned at the top edge of the window when the page is displayed. The offset is relative to the top edge of the page. I.e. offset 0 means "display page starting from the top edge".

member.name: T:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfLineAnnotation
member.summary: Class for a line annotation.

member.name: T:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfLineCap
member.summary: Specifies the shape to be used at the ends of open subpaths (and dashes, if any) when they are stroked.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfLineCap.ButtEnd
member.summary: The stroke is squared off at the endpoint of the path. There is no projection beyond the end of the path.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfLineCap.Round
member.summary: A semicircular arc with a diameter equal to the line width is drawn around the endpoint and filled in.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfLineCap.ProjectingSquare
member.summary: The stroke continues beyond the endpoint of the path for a distance equal to half the line width and is squared off.

member.name: T:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfLineJoin
member.summary: Specifies the shape of joints between connected segments of a stroked path.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfLineJoin.Miter
member.summary: The outer edges of the strokes for the two segments are extended until they meet at an angle. If the segments meet at too sharp an angle (as defined by the property), a join is used instead.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfLineJoin.Round
member.summary: An arc of a circle with a diameter equal to the line width is drawn around the point where the two segments meet, connecting the outer edges of the strokes for the two segments. This pie slice-shaped figure is filled in, producing a rounded corner.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfLineJoin.Bevel
member.summary: The two segments are finished with butt caps (see property) and the resulting notch beyond the ends of the segments is filled with a triangle.

member.name: T:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfLineSegment
member.summary: Straight line segment.

member.summary: End point of this .

member.summary: Start point of this .

member.name: T:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfPattern
member.summary: Base class for all PDF pattern classes.

member.name: T:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfPatternPaintType
member.summary: Specifies how the color of the cell is to be specified.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfPatternPaintType.Colored
member.summary: The pattern is colored. The pattern itself is to be used for drawing.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfPatternPaintType.Uncolored
member.summary: The pattern has no color. The pattern describes a stencil through which the current color is to be poured.

member.name: T:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfPatternTiling
member.summary: Specifies adjustments to the spacing of tiles relative to the device pixel grid.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfPatternTiling.ConstantSpacing
member.summary: Pattern cells are spaced consistently - that is, by a multiple of a device pixel. To achieve this, the application may need to distort the pattern cell slightly. The amount of distortion does not exceed 1 device pixel.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfPatternTiling.NoDistortion
member.summary: The pattern cell is not distorted, but the spacing between pattern cells may vary by as much as 1 device pixel, both horizontally and vertically, when the pattern is painted.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfPatternTiling.ConstantSpacingAndFasterTiling
member.summary: Pattern cells are spaced consistently as in but with additional distortion permitted to enable a more efficient implementation.

member.summary: Class for a widget (annotation). Widget is an object such as a note, sound, or movie with a location on a page of a PDF document, or an interactive control that provides a way to interact with the user by means of the mouse and keyboard. member.name: T:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfWidgetFlags
member.summary: Specifies various characteristics of a .

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfWidgetFlags.Invisible
member.summary: If set, do not display the widget if it does not belong to one of the standard widget types and there is no action associated with the widget.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfWidgetFlags.Hidden
member.summary: If set, do not display or print the widget or allow it to interact with the user, regardless of its widget type or whether there is an action associated with the widget.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfWidgetFlags.Print
member.summary: If set, print the widget when the page is printed. If clear, never print the widget, regardless of whether it is displayed on the screen.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfWidgetFlags.NoZoom
member.summary: If set, do not scale the widget's appearance to match the magnification of the page.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfWidgetFlags.NoRotate
member.summary: If set, do not rotate the widget's appearance to match the rotation of the page.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfWidgetFlags.NoView
member.summary: If set, do not display the widget on the screen or allow it to interact with the user. The widget may be printed (depending on the setting of the flag) but should be considered hidden for purposes of on-screen display and user interaction.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfWidgetFlags.ReadOnly
member.summary: If set, do not allow the widget to interact with the user. The widget may be displayed or printed (depending on the settings of the and flags) but should not respond to mouse clicks or change its appearance in response to mouse motions.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfWidgetFlags.Locked
member.summary: (PDF 1.4) If set, do not allow the widget to be deleted or its properties (including position and size) to be modified by the user. This flag does not restrict changes to the widget's contents, such as the value of a form field.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfWidgetFlags.ToggleNoView
member.summary: (PDF 1.5) If set, invert the interpretation of the flag for certain events.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfWidgetFlags.LockedContents
member.summary: (PDF 1.7) If set, do not allow the contents of the widget to be modified by the user. This flag does not restrict deletion of the widget or changes to other widget properties, such as position and size.

member.name: T:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfZoom
member.summary: Specifies zoom type.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfZoom.PercentBased
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with the coordinates (left, top) positioned at the upper-left corner of the window and the contents of the page magnified by the factor zoom.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfZoom.FitPage
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with its contents magnified just enough to fit the entire page within the window both horizontally and vertically.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfZoom.FitWidth
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with the vertical coordinate top positioned at the top edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire width of the page within the window.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfZoom.FitHeight
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with the horizontal coordinate left positioned at the left edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire height of the page within the window.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfZoom.FitRect
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with its contents magnified just enough to fit the rectangle specified by the coordinates left, bottom, right, and top entirely within the window both horizontally and vertically.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfZoom.FitBBox
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with its contents magnified just enough to fit its bounding box entirely within the window both horizontally and vertically.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfZoom.FitBBoxWidth
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with the vertical coordinate top positioned at the top edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire width of its bounding box within the window.

member.name: F:BitMiracle.Docotic.Pdf.PdfZoom.FitBBoxHeight
member.summary: Display the page designated by page, with the horizontal coordinate left positioned at the left edge of the window and the contents of the page magnified just enough to fit the entire height of its bounding box within the window.
